com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles

Class ParticleEffect.NoteColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles.ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
      • com.massivecraft.factions.util.Particles.ParticleEffect.NoteColor
  • Enclosing class:
    ParticleEffect

    public static final class ParticleEffect.NoteColor
extends ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
    Represents the color for the ParticleEffect.NOTE effect

    This class is part of the ParticleEffect Library and follows the same usage conditions

    Since:
    1.7
